Amazing game.
I am winning a match and I have a lot of points.
But of course this is CS:GO and something had to went wrong.
Not only my game crashed but I also had to check the files verification because I couldn't get back into the game. Good job Valve :^)
Very good game! In India not so popular, but I suggest download word.exe for very good aim and good monitor settings.

Fun to play with friends, risky to play solo queue.
It's great when you find nice teammates (higher chance with good trust factor), and terrible when you play with idiots cheating (VAC is broken), griefing, not communicating, trolling, afk...
And also sometimes the game is broken as well, volvo plz fix.

In conclusion:
not great, not terrible.
